comment.author: 50544540@N05
comment._content: I believe the picture shows the whale bones on the Royal Sydney Yacht Squadrons lawn in the top left corner and the club house on the shore line below. Also the boys are possibly members of the Snapper Island group of Sea cadets although my recollection of their correct name escapes me.  this identification might also apply to Picture 00023227,
